Required Aggregation Group but which satisfy the minimum participation standards
of IRC Section 410 and Section 401(a)(4) when considered together with the
Required Aggregation Group.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -1.0in; margin-left: 1.0in">
10.09&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Non-Top Heavy Plan Year</u> means any Plan Year Plan in
which the requirements for a Top Heavy Year are not satisfied.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 1.0in">IN WITNESS
WHEREOF, the Employer has caused this instrument to be executed in its name and
attested to by its corporate officers thereunto duly authorized as of this 23rd
day of September, 2004.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 3.0in">GIBRALTAR
STEEL CORPORATION
OF NEW YORK</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: 3.0in">By:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<u>/s/ Brian K. Lipke&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </u></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify">Attest:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify"><u>/s/&nbsp; Henning Kornbrekke&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

    10/01/99</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td valign="top" style="width: 510; border-left: medium none windowtext; border-right: medium none windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: medium none windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in" height="17">
    <p class="Style0">

    &nbsp;</td>
    <td valign="top" style="width: 128; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: medium none windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in" height="17">
    <p class="Style0">

    &nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>

<p>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

GIBRALTAR 401(k) PLAN</p>
<p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

First Amendment to<br>

Amendment and Restatement Effective October 1, 2004</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; line-height: 24.0pt"><b>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </b>
WHEREAS, Gibraltar
Steel Corporation of New York, a New York corporation having its principal place
of business at Buffalo, New York, (the &quot;Employer&quot;) and certain of its affiliated
companies maintain a 401(k) plan, known as the Gibraltar 401(k) Plan, (the
&quot;Plan&quot;);<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WHEREAS, pursuant to the terms of the Plan, the Employer on its own
behalf and on behalf of the affiliated companies participating in the Plan now
desires to amend said Plan effective January 1, 2005 to allow Portals Plus,
Incorporated to become a participating Affiliate under the Plan, to make changes
that are required in light of the merger of the Roof Products &amp; Systems Co. and
Portals Plus, Inc. 401(k) Profit Sharing Plan into the Plan and to extend the
Plan to all employees, other than collectively bargained employees, of
Construction Metals, Inc.;<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; NOW, THEREFORE, the Employer hereby amends said Plan effective
January 1, 2005 as follows:<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Subsection (d) where it first appears in Section 2.01 is
hereby amended to read as

follows:<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Employees of an Affiliate that does not
participate in this Plan.&quot;<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Section 6.07 is hereby amended by the addition thereto of
the following Section

6.07(e):</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: .5in">

&quot;6.07(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>Normal Form of Benefit for Portals Plus Participants</u>
- - The provisions set

forth in Sections 6.07(a) through 6.07(d) above shall apply to any Participant
who was a Participant in the Roof Products &amp; Systems Co. and Portals Plus, Inc.
401(k) Profit Sharing Plan with the following modifications:</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -2.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 2.0in">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a Participant is married on
the first day of the first period for which an amount is payable as an annuity
(the annuity starting date), his benefit shall be paid in the form of a
qualified joint and survivor annuity, unless the Participant elects not to
receive his benefit in such form or elects one of the other options contained in
Section 6.07(a) hereof;</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -2.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 2.0in">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; If a Participant is not married
on his annuity starting date, his benefit shall be paid in the form of a life
annuity, unless the Participant elects not to receive his benefit in such form
or elects one or the other options contained in Section 6.07(a) hereof; and</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; text-indent: -2.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 2.0in">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The methods of distribution of
benefits provided under Section 6.07(a) (2) and (3) and the provisions of
Sections 6.07(b) through 6.07(d) and this Section 6.07(e) shall no longer apply
to any Participant whose annuity starting date is after the earlier of (i) the
90th&nbsp;day after the date the
Participant has been furnished a summary that reflects the elimination of the
optional forms of benefits set forth in Sections 6.07(a)(2) and (3) and the
above provisions contained in (1) and (2) of this Section 6.07(e) or (ii)
January 1, 2007, which is the first day of the second Plan Year following the
Plan Year during which those methods of distribution of benefits are being
eliminated.&quot;</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; line-height: 24.0pt">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Appendix A entitled &quot;Participating Affiliated Companies&quot;
is hereby amended as reflected in the Appendix A attached to this First
Amendment To Amendment and Restatement Effective October 1, 2004.<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Employer has caused this instrument to be
executed in its name and attested by its Corporate officers thereunto duly
authorized as of this 18 day of November, 2004.</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-indent: -3.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 3.0in">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
GIBRALTAR STEEL CORPORATION OF
NEW
YORK</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-indent: -3.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 3.0in">
<b>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </b>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; By:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>/s/ David W.
Kay&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </u></p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; line-height: 12.0pt">

ATTEST:</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; line-height: 12.0pt"><u>

/s/ Ellen Green&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </u></p>

    <p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

    APPENDIX A<br>
    <u>

    PARTICIPATING AFFILIATED COMPANIES</u></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td valign="top" style="width: 489; border-left: medium none windowtext; border-right: medium none windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: medium none windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

    &nbsp;</td>
    <td valign="top" style="width: 149; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: medium none windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
    <p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

    &nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td valign="top" style="width: 489; border-left: medium none windowtext; border-right: medium none windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: medium none windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">

<p class="MsoNormal">Service with the above
organizations will be recognized for Plan eligibility purposes,&nbsp; subject to the
modification as set forth next to the organization's name.</p>
<p>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

GIBRALTAR 401(k) PLAN</p>
<p class="Style0" align="center" style="text-align: center">

Second Amendment to<br>

Amendment and Restatement Effective October 1, 2004</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-align: justify; line-height: 24.0pt"><b>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </b>
WHEREAS, Gibraltar
Steel Corporation of New York, a New York corporation having its principal place
of business at Buffalo, New York, (the &quot;Employer&quot;) and certain of its affiliated
companies maintain a 401(k) plan, known as the Gibraltar 401(k) Plan, (the
&quot;Plan&quot;);<br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WHEREAS, pursuant to the terms of the Plan, the Employer on its own
behalf and on behalf of the affiliated companies participating in the Plan now
desires to amend said Plan effective April 1, 2004 to allow GIT Limited to
become a participating Affiliate under the Plan; <br>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; NOW, THEREFORE, the Employer hereby amends said Plan effective April
1, 2004 as follows:<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Appendix A entitled &quot;Participating Affiliated Companies&quot; is hereby amended as
reflected in the Appendix A attached to this Second Amendment To Amendment and
Restatement Effective October 1, 2004.<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Employer has caused this instrument to be executed in
its name and attested by its Corporate officers thereunto duly authorized as of
this 21 day of&nbsp; December, 2004.</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-indent: -3.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 3.0in">

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
GIBRALTAR STEEL CORPORATION OF NEW YORK</p>
<p class="Style0" style="text-indent: -3.0in; line-height: 12.0pt; margin-left: 3.0in">
<b>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </b>

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
By:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>/s/ David W.
Kay&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </u></p>

    <td width="167" valign="top" style="width:124.9pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt">
    <p class="style0">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td width="499" valign="top" style="width:374.6pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt">
    <p class="style0">GIT Limited</td>
    <td width="167" valign="top" style="width:124.9pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt">
    <p class="style0">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 04/01/04</td>
  </tr>
</table>
<p class="MsoNormal">Service with the above organizations will be recognized for
Plan eligibility purposes,&nbsp; subject to the modification as set forth next to the
organization's name.</p>
<p>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center">GIBRALTAR 401(k)
PLAN</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center">Third Amendment to<br>
Amendment and
Restatement Effective October 1, 2004</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify;text-indent:.5in;line-height:200%">
WHEREAS, Gibraltar Steel Corporation of New York, a New York corporation having
its principal place of business at Buffalo, New York, (the &quot;Employer&quot;) and
certain of its affiliated companies maintain a 401(k) plan, known as the
Gibraltar 401(k) Plan, (the &quot;Plan&quot;);<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WHEREAS, pursuant to the terms of the Plan, the Employer on its own behalf
and on behalf of the affiliated companies participating in the Plan amended said
Plan effective January 1, 2005 by a First Amendment to Amendment and Restatement
Effective October 1, 2004 signed November 18, 2004 to allow Portals Plus,
Incorporated to become a Participating Affiliate under the Plan and to make
changes that were required in light of an approved merger of the Roof Products &amp;
Systems Co. and Portals Plus, Inc. 401(k) Profit Sharing Plan into the Plan;<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WHEREAS, pursuant to Section 8.01 of the Plan, the Board of Directors of
the Employer by Written Consent Without a Meeting dated December 13, 2004
amended the Plan to revoke Portals Plus, Incorporated becoming a Participating
Affiliate under the Plan effective January 1, 2005 and revoking its approval of
the merger of the Roof Products &amp; Systems Co. and Portals Plus, Inc. 401(k)
Profit Sharing Plan into the Plan effective January 1, 2005; and<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WHEREAS, the Employer now desires to codify such amendment by this Third
Amendment to Amendment and Restatement Effective October 1, 2004;<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; NOW, THEREFORE, the Employer hereby amends said Plan effective January 1,
2005 as follows:<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Section 6.07(e) as added by the First Amendment to Amendment and
Restatement Effective October 1, 2004 is hereby deleted.<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Appendix A entitled &quot;Participating Affiliated Companies&quot; is hereby
amended as reflected in the Appendix A
attached to this Third Amendment To Amendment and Restatement Effective October
1, 2004.<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Employer has caused this instrument to be executed in
its name and attested by its Corporate officers thereunto duly authorized as of
this 14 day of January, 2005.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="page-break-after: avoid; margin-left: 3.0in">
GIBRALTAR STEEL CORPORATION OF NEW YORK</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="page-break-after: avoid; margin-left: 3.0in">By:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <u>/s/ David W.
Kay&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </u></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify">ATTEST:<br>

<SEQUENCE>3

<body>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center">EXHIBIT A<br>
<br>
CODE OF ETHICS<br>
FOR SENIOR
FINANCIAL OFFICERS<br>
AND THE CHIEF
EXECUTIVE OFFICER<br>
OF<br>
GIBRALTAR STEEL
CORPORATION</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Gibraltar Steel
Corporation (the &quot;Company&quot;) is committed to conducting its business in
compliance with all the applicable laws and regulations of the countries in
which it operates and in accordance with high standards of business conduct. The
Company strives to maintain and promote
honest and ethical conduct, including the ethical handling of actual or apparent
conflicts of interest between personal and professional relationships; full,
fair, accurate, timely, and understandable disclosure in reports and documents
that it files with, or submits to, the Securities and Commission and in other
public communications made by it; compliance with applicable governmental laws,
rules and regulations; prompt internal reporting to an appropriate person or
persons of violations of the code; and accountability for adherence to the code.
These standards serve as the basis for managing the Company's business,
for meeting the Company's duties to its shareholders and for maintaining
compliance with financial reporting requirements. </p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; All of the Company's
financial executives must agree to comply with the following principles, and the
Chief Executive Officer, in his or her capacity as the Company's principal
executive officer, to whom all senior financial officers ultimately report, will
promote and support this Code of Ethics, and, to the extent consistent with his
or her duties and responsibilities, comply with the following principles:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u>Honest and Ethical Conduct<br>
<br>
</u>
<font size="3">Act with honesty and integrity and in an ethical manner, avoiding
actual or apparent conflicts of interest in personal and professional
relationships.<br>
<u>
<br>
</u>Promptly disclose to the Company through the Audit Committee any
material transaction or relationship that reasonably could be expected to give
rise to a conflict of interest between personal and professional relationships.<br>
<u>
<br>
</u>Promote and reward ethical behavior in all aspects of the
Company.&nbsp; Eliminate inhibitions and barriers to responsible behavior, such as
coercion or fear of reprisal.&nbsp; Demonstrate personal support for all policies and
procedures regarding ethical behavior in the Company.<u><br>
<br>
</u>Act in good faith, responsibility, with due care, competence and
diligence, without misrepresenting material facts or allowing independent
judgment to be subordinated.<u><br>
<br>
</u>Respect the confidentiality of information acquired in the course
of the Company's business, except when authorized or otherwise legally obligated
to disclose such information, and not use confidential information acquired in
the course of work for personal advantage.<br>
<u>
<br>
</u>Do not knowingly be a party to any illegal activity or engage in
acts that are discreditable to his or her profession or the Company.</p>
<u>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u>Financial Records and Periodic Reports<br>
<br>
</u></u>Devise, implement and maintain sufficient internal controls to
assure that financial record keeping objectives are met.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Maintain books and records that fairly and accurately
reflect the Company's business transactions<br>
<br>
Use good business judgment in the processing and recording of all
financial transactions.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Ensure that accounting entries are promptly and accurately
recorded and properly documented and that no accounting entry intentionally
distorts or disguises the true nature of any business transaction.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Prohibit the establishment
of any undisclosed or unrecorded funds or assets for any purpose and provide for
the proper and prompt recording of all disbursements of funds and all receipts.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Provide information that is accurate, complete, objective,
relevant, timely and understandable.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Achieve responsible use of and control over all assets and
resources employed or entrusted to him or her.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Comply with generally accepted accounting standards and
practices, rules, regulations and controls.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Sign only those documents that he or she believes to
accurate and truthful.&nbsp; Do not make, or tolerate to be made, false or
artificial statements or entries for any purpose in the books and records of the
Company or in any internal or external correspondence, memoranda, or
communication of any type, including telephone or wire communications.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u>Compliance with Applicable Laws, Rules and Regulations<br>
<br>
</u>Comply with laws, rules and regulations of federal, state,
provincial and local governments and other appropriate and private and public
regulatory agencies.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Identify, report and correct any detected deviations from
applicable laws, rules and regulations.</p>
<u>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u>Report Violations of this Code of Ethics<br>
<font size="3"><br>
</u></u>Report to the Company, through the Audit Committee, any situation
where the Code of Ethics, the Company's standards or the laws are being
violated.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">Any waiver of any
provision of this Code of Ethics must be approved, in advance, by the Audit
Committee.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">Those required to
comply with this Code of Ethics understand that failure to comply with this Code
of Ethics will not be tolerated by the Company and that deviations therefrom or
violations thereof will result in serious consequences, which may include, but
may not be limited to, serious reprimand, dismissal or other legal actions.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">The parties subject
to this Code of Ethics will acknowledge in writing that they agree to comply
with these requirements.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">The undersigned, the
[insert title] of Gibraltar Steel Corporation hereby acknowledges and agrees to
comply with the Code of Ethics of Gibraltar Steel Corporation attached hereto.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
__________________________________________<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Name:<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Title:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify"><u>
<br>

&nbsp;</p>

</body>

</html>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

      International, Inc.</td>

    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td width="24" valign="top" style="width: .25in; border-left: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-right: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      &nbsp;</td>
      <td width="24" colspan="2" valign="top" style="width: .25in; border-left: medium none; border-right: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p style="margin-left: .05in">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="408" valign="top" style="width: 4.25in; border-left: medium none; border-right: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p style="margin-left: .05in">B &amp; W Heat
      Treating Corp.</td>
      <td width="156" valign="top" style="width: 117.2pt; border-left: medium none; border-right: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoTitle" align="left" style="text-align: left; margin-left: 5.05pt">
      Nova Scotia, Canada</td>
    </tr>

      <td width="24" valign="top" style="width: .25in; border-left: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-right: 1.0pt solid windowtext; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">

<title>CERTIFICATIONS</title>
</head>

<body>

  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-autospace: none; margin-left: 63.0pt; margin-right: .5in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoBodyTextIndent2" align="left" style="text-align: left">
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&
nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </p>
  <p class="MsoHeading8" align="center" style="text-align: center">

  CERTIFICATIONS</p>
  <p class="MsoHeading8" align="center" style="text-align: left; margin-left:6in">

  EXHIBIT 31.1</p>
  <p class="MsoHeading8" align="center" style="text-align: center">

  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoBlockText">I, Brian J. Lipke, certify that:</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I have reviewed this report on
  Form 10-K of Gibraltar Industries, Inc.; <br>
&nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, this
  report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to
  state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
  circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with
  respect to the period covered by this report;<br>
&nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, the
  financial statements, and other financial information included in this report,
  fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of
  operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods
  presented in this report;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The registrant's other
  certifying officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
  disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e)
  and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
  Exchange Act Rules 15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and we have:</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  designed such disclosure controls and procedures or caused such
  disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to
  ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its
  consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those
  entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
  prepared;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such
  internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our
  supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of
  financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external
  purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and
  procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the
  effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the
  period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and,</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal
  control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's fourth
  fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to
  materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 94.05pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The registrant's other
  certifying officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation
  of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and
  the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons
  performing the equivalent function):</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or
  operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably
  likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process,
  summarize and report financial information; and</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -29.25pt; margin-left: 137.25pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other
  employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control
  over financial reporting.</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date: March 11, 2005</p>
  <table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 72.9pt">
    <tr>
      <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">/s/ Brian J. Lipke</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border: medium none; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">Brian J. Lipke</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">

      Officer and Chairman of the Board </td>

<body>

  <p class="MsoHeading8" style="margin-left: 6.0in">

  EXHIBIT 31.2</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  CERTIFICATIONS</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
 &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoBlockText">I, Henning Kornbrekke, certify that:</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; I have reviewed this report on Form
  10-K of Gibraltar Industries, Inc.; <br>
&nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on my knowledge, this report
  does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a
  material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the
  circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with
  respect to the period covered by this report;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Based on my knowledge, the
  financial statements, and other financial information included in this report,
  fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of
  operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods
  presented in this report;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.5in; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The registrant's other certifying
  officers and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure
  controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and
  15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
  Exchange Act Rules 15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and we have:</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -31.5pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; designed such disclosure controls and
  procedures or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
  under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the
  registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
  others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this
  report is being prepared;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -27.0pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Designed such internal control over
  financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting
  to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance
  regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of
  financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
  accepted accounting principles.</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -.35in; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;evaluated the effectiveness of the
  registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report
  our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and
  procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such
  evaluation; and, </p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -22.5pt; margin-left: 121.5pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -22.5pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; disclosed in this report any change in
  the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; occurred
  during the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or
  is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control
  over financial reporting.</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  <br>
  5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; The registrant's other certifying
  officers and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal
  control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit
  committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the
  equivalent function):</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; all significant deficiencies and
  material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over
  financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the
  registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial
  information; and</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent: -34.2pt; margin-left: 135.0pt; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; any fraud, whether or not material,
  that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
  registrant's internal control over financial reporting.</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Date: March 11, 2005</p>

  <p>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 6.0in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  EXHIBIT 32.1</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="right" style="text-align: right; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD PURSUANT TO
  TITLE 18, UNITED STATES CODE, SECTION 1350, </p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoBlockText" style="margin-left: 0.5in">I, Brian J. Lipke, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C.
  Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of
  2002, that to my knowledge, Gibraltar Industries, Inc.'s Annual Report on Form
  10-K for the year &nbsp;ended December 31, 2004 fully complies with the requirement
  of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and that
  information contained in such Annual Report on Form 10-K fairly presents in
  all material respects the financial condition and results of operations of
  Gibraltar Industries, Inc. </p>
  <p class="MsoBlockText">&nbsp;</p>
  <table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 72.9pt">
    <tr>

      <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">

  <p>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoHeading8" style="margin-left: 6.0in">

  EXHIBIT 32.2</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  CERTIFICATION OF PRESIDENT AND CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER PURSUANT TO TITLE 18,
  UNITED STATES CODE, SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoBlockText" style="margin-left: 0.5in">I, Henning Kornbrekke, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C.
  Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of
  2002, that to my knowledge, Gibraltar Industries, Inc.'s Annual Report on Form
  10-K for the year ended December 31, 2004 fully complies with the requirement
  of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and that
  information contained in such Annual Report on Form 10-K fairly presents in
  all material respects the financial condition and results of operations of
  Gibraltar Industries, Inc. </p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in">&nbsp;</p>
  <table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 72.9pt">
    <tr>
      <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border-left: medium none; border-right: medium none; border-top: medium none; border-bottom: 1.0pt solid windowtext; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">/s/ Henning Kornbrekke</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; border: medium none; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">Henning Kornbrekke</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td width="258" valign="top" style="width: 193.5pt; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</td>
      <td width="360" valign="top" style="width: 3.75in; padding-left: 5.4pt; padding-right: 5.4pt; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in">
      <p class="MsoNormal">President and Chief Operating Officer</p>
      <p class="MsoNormal">March 11, 2005</td>
    </tr>
  </table>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 63.0pt; margin-right: .75in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  A signed original of this written statement required by Section 906, or other
  document authenticating acknowledging or otherwise adopting the signature that
  appears in typed form within the electronic version of this written statement
  required by Section 906, has been provided to Gibraltar Industries, Inc. and
  will be retained by Gibraltar Industries, Inc. and furnished to the Securities
  and Exchange Commission or its Staff upon request.</body></html>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

  <p class="MsoNormal" align="right" style="text-align: right; margin-left: 63.0pt; margin-right: .75in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  EXHIBIT 32.3</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  CERTIFICATION OF EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER PURSUANT
  TO TITLE 18, UNITED STATES CODE, SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION
  906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align: center; margin-left: .9in; margin-right: .2in; margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: .0001pt">
  &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoBlockText" style="margin-left: 0.5in">I, David W. Kay, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C.
  Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of
  2002, that to my knowledge, Gibraltar Industries, Inc.'s Annual Report on Form
  10-K for the year ended December 31, 2004 fully complies with the requirement
  of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and that
  information contained in such Annual Report on Form 10-K fairly presents in
  all material respects the financial condition and results of operations of
  Gibraltar Industries, Inc. &nbsp;</p>
  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-right: .2in; margin-left:0.5in">&nbsp;</p>
  <table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; margin-left: 72.9pt">
